abstract.para: Automate &SERVICENAME; with other &AWS; services by using &EV;.

section.para: &EV; enables you to automate your &AWS; services and respond automatically to system events such as application availability issues or resource changes. Events from &AWS; services are delivered to &EV; in near real time. You can write simple rules to indicate which events are of interest to you, and what automated actions to take when an event matches a rule. The actions that can be automatically triggered include the following:

listitem.para: Notifying an &SNS; topic or an &SMS; queue

section.para: Some examples of using &CWE; with YourService include:

listitem.para: Activating a &LAM; function whenever Something Significant Happens in YourService.
Notifying an &SNS; topic when Something Else Significant Happens in YourService.
